message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1000000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its rarity and the impact it can have on you, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price. My proposal is to extend the offer at $1200000. This price reflects my desire to share this valuable asset while ensuring a fair return for myself. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. Kind regards, Alice.
